name: Suspicious PowerShell Download and Execute Pattern
description: Detects suspicious PowerShell download patterns that are often used in malicious scripts, stagers or downloaders (make sure that your backend applies the strings case-insensitive)
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)

detection.query: selection: {"CommandLine|contains": ["IEX ((New-Object Net.WebClient).DownloadString", "IEX (New-Object Net.WebClient).DownloadString", "IEX((New-Object Net.WebClient).DownloadString", "IEX(New-Object Net.WebClient).DownloadString", " -command (New-Object System.Net.WebClient).DownloadFile(", " -c (New-Object System.Net.WebClient).DownloadFile("]}

falsepositives: Software installers that pull packages from remote systems and execute them
